00011 // exponential.cpp*
00012 #include "volume.h"
00013 // ExponentialDensity Declarations
00014 class ExponentialDensity : public DensityRegion {
00015 public:
00016         // ExponentialDensity Public Methods
00017         ExponentialDensity(const Spectrum &sa, const Spectrum &ss,
00018                         float gg, const Spectrum &emit, const BBox &e,
00019                         const Transform &v2w, float aa, float bb,
00020                         const Vector &up)
00021                 : DensityRegion(sa, ss, gg, emit, v2w),
00022                   extent(e), a(aa), b(bb) {
00023                 upDir = Normalize(up);
00024         }
00025         BBox WorldBound() const { return WorldToVolume.GetInverse()(extent); }
00026         bool IntersectP(const Ray &r, float *t0, float *t1) const {
00027                 Ray ray = WorldToVolume(r);
00028                 return extent.IntersectP(ray, t0, t1);
00029         }
00030         float Density(const Point &Pobj) const {
00031                 if (!extent.Inside(Pobj)) return 0;
00032                 float height = Dot(Pobj - extent.pMin, upDir);
00033                 return a * expf(-b * height);
00034         }
00035 private:
00036         // ExponentialDensity Private Data
00037         BBox extent;
00038         float a, b;
00039         Vector upDir;
00040 };
00041 // ExponentialDensity Method Definitions
00042 extern "C" DLLEXPORT VolumeRegion *CreateVolumeRegion(const Transform &volume2world,
00043                 const ParamSet &params) {
00044         // Initialize common volume region parameters
00045         Spectrum sigma_a = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_a", 0.);
00046         Spectrum sigma_s = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_s", 0.);
00047         float g = params.FindOneFloat("g", 0.);
00048         Spectrum Le = params.FindOneSpectrum("Le", 0.);
00049         Point p0 = params.FindOnePoint("p0", Point(0,0,0));
00050         Point p1 = params.FindOnePoint("p1", Point(1,1,1));
00051         float a = params.FindOneFloat("a", 1.);
00052         float b = params.FindOneFloat("b", 1.);
00053         Vector up = params.FindOneVector("updir", Vector(0,1,0));
00054         return new ExponentialDensity(sigma_a, sigma_s, g, Le, BBox(p0, p1),
00055                 volume2world, a, b, up);
00056 }
